sentences.english: He was wounded in both legs and severely peppered with shrapnel.
sentences.chinese: 他兩條腿都掛彩了，人也被如雨的彈片炸成重傷。

sentences.english: Because the enemy number all the I, ray in mother was badly wounded in the battle.
sentences.chinese: 由於敵人數量衆我，雷母在激戰中負了重傷。

sentences.english: Poor Barry stopped a packet when his car was in collision with a lorry.
sentences.chinese: 巴里的車與一輛卡車相撞，可憐的巴里身負重傷。

sentences.english: But we found that baron leg injury, still adhere to the game.
sentences.chinese: 可是大家發現巴朗腿受重傷，依然堅持比賽。

sentences.english: Two of the seriously injured were transferred to a better hospital for treatment of medical conditions.
sentences.chinese: 其中兩名重傷員被轉運到醫療條件更好的醫院治療。

sentences.english: This year, there were no tricks and no serious injuries.
sentences.chinese: 今年的比賽沒有騙人把戲，也沒有人重傷。

sentences.english: A man was in a bad accident and was injured.
sentences.chinese: 有一個人遭遇了一場嚴重的意外事故並受了重傷。

sentences.english: Paul was badly injured when his car was in head-on collision with a bus.
sentences.chinese: 保爾的汽車同一輛公共汽車迎頭相撞時，受了重傷。

sentences.english: Those who sustained serious injuries will get Rs. 1 Lakh each.
sentences.chinese: 那些身受重傷，將得到每一個盧比萬盧比。

sentences.english: He was seriously injured in the accident and died several days later.
sentences.chinese: 他在那次事故中受了重傷，幾天後就死了。

sentences.english: He received severe injuries and nearly lost his life during the Second World War.
sentences.chinese: 在第二次世界大戰期間他身負重傷險些喪命。

sentences.english: She suffered extensive injuries in the accident.
The seriously injured boy has been admitted to the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 醫院收下了那受重傷的男孩。

sentences.english: One of the miners managed to get out alive. He's thought to be a 14-year-old boy, who sustained severe injuries.
sentences.chinese: 一名14歲的礦工成功生還，但是身受重傷。

sentences.english: They ofter get seriously injured—and sometimes killed.
sentences.chinese: 他們經常身受重傷，有時甚至死亡。

sentences.english: There ewer vey few passengers who escaped without serious injury.
sentences.chinese: 旅客很少，他們沒有受到重傷都逃出來了。

definition: to be wounded/to sustain an injury
to inflict heavy losses/to inflict serious damage
to cause damage to/to ruin/to destroy
